You are encouraged, though not required, to use Zotero to store your readings.
You can save news articles using the browser extension for your browser of choice.
If you save the news article as a PDF (go to "print" and then choose "save as PDF") you can link the PDF to your library and your annotations will be saved.

There are other great tools, including [Randrop.io](https://raindrop.io) and [hypothes.is](https://hypothes.is/).
Figure out what works for you!
